question: Explain the impact of AI on modern education, and provide examples of AI tools used in classrooms.
true_answer: The impact of AI on modern education includes personalized learning and efficiency in administrative tasks. Examples of AI tools in classrooms are adaptive learning platforms and automated grading systems.

steps.description: Research impact of AI on education
Find examples of AI tools in classrooms
